Parameters: Rect: On call, this contains the bounds the list has selected for the item (that is the bounds of the entire view). The values can be modified as desired.
adjustListItemSelectionBounds(android.gr.Description: Called to allow the list item to adjust the bounds shown for its selection.

ClassDesc: The top-level view of a list item can implement this interface to allow itself to modify the bounds of the selection shown for that item.
